P.HT: Instructions for completing the template for informing of potential risks

GR.SEQ.P: The Cell Reference column of the table below identifies the items to be reported by identifying the columns and lines as showed in the template in Annex III

ROW.CELL: The full name of the competent authority.
Identify the ISO 8601 in UTC time format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ) code of the date when the report from the competent authority is made.
Identify the ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) code of the date identifying the last day of the reporting period.
The main liaison at the competent authority that is responsible for completing the potential risks template.
The function of the main liaison at the competent authority that is responsible for completing the potential risks template.
Phone number of the main liaison.
The phone number of the main liaison at the competent authority who is responsible for completing the potential risks template.
Email address of the main liaison.
The email address of the main liaison at the competent authority that is responsible for completing the potential risks template.
Identification of any potential risks resulting from the internalised settlement activity in the jurisdiction.
